product_name: Terry Tourista Tank Top Bike Jersey - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Breathe deep and enjoy a casual summer ride in the relaxed Terry Tourista Tank Top Bike Jersey for women. The sleeveless design offers comfort and performance for trail rides and city cruising. Polyester fabric with a touch of spandex dries quickly, resists wrinkles, wicks moisture away from your body and stretches for the ideal fit. V-neck and an empire waist accent the loose and relaxed fit. Terry Tourista Tank Top Bike Jersey for women has 3 back pockets to hold your snacks and small essentials. Closeout.
short_description: Breathe deep and enjoy a casual summer ride in the relaxed Terry Tourista Tank Top Bike Jersey for women. The sleeveless design offers comfort and performance for trail rides and city cruising.
